ISSUE.TITLE: Remove unused services from AvalaraTaxManager class
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The AvalaraTaxManager class contains following unused services: - IActionContextAccessor - ICheckoutAttributeService - ILocalizationService - ISettingService - ITaxPluginManager - IUrlHelperFactory - IWebHelper - WidgetSettings

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: use existing customer paramter for GetCustomerTaxDisplayTypeAsync
